Mayor's Office
==============

The Mayor is responsible for overseeing departments and executing policies, including:

* Assuring that all City services are delivered to the citizens of Reno in an effective, efficient, and equitable manner and in compliance with
  [City Council](https://www.renotexas.us/319/City-Council)
  policy
* Overseeing with input and assistance from the city council long-range planning and improvement of departmental management and service delivery
* Serving as the primary outreach arm of the City government to other cities and other government entities
